patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,1 +1,52 @@
-package services
\ No newline at end of file
+package services
+
+import (
+    "database/sql"
+    "fmt"
+
+    "quickpoll/config"
+)
+
+type PollData struct {
+    ID          string `json:"id"`
+    Title       string `json:"title"`
+    Description string `json:"description"`
+    ExpiresAt   string `json:"expires_at"`
+    Status      string `json:"status"`
+    Options     []Option
+}
+
+type Option struct {
+    ID    int    `json:"id"`
+    Text  string `json:"text"`
+    Index int    `json:"order_index"`
+}
+
+func FetchPollData(pollID string) (*PollData, error) {
+    row := config.DB.QueryRow("SELECT id, title, description, expires_at, status FROM polls WHERE id = ?", pollID)
+    var p PollData
+    if err := row.Scan(&p.ID, &p.Title, &p.Description, &p.ExpiresAt, &p.Status); err != nil {
+        if err == sql.ErrNoRows {
+            return nil, fmt.Errorf("poll not found")
+        }
+        return nil, err
+    }
+
+    rows, err := config.DB.Query("SELECT id, option_text, order_index FROM poll_options WHERE poll_id = ?", pollID)
+    if err != nil {
+        return nil, err
+    }
+    defer rows.Close()
+
+    var options []Option
+    for rows.Next() {
+        var o Option
+        if err := rows.Scan(&o.ID, &o.Text, &o.Index); err != nil {
+            return nil, err
+        }
+        options = append(options, o)
+    }
+
+    p.Options = options
+    return &p, nil
+}
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,53 @@
+package services
+
+import (
+    "database/sql"
+    "fmt"
+
+    "backand/config"
+)
+
+type PollData struct {
+    ID          string `json:"id"`
+    Title       string `json:"title"`
+    Description string `json:"description"`
+    ExpiresAt   string `json:"expires_at"`
+    Status      string `json:"status"`
+    Options              []Option  `json:"options"`
+    Results              []PollResult `json:"results,omitempty"`
+}
+
+type Option struct {
+    ID    int    `json:"id"`
+    Text  string `json:"text"`
+    Index int    `json:"order_index"`
+}
+
+func FetchPollData(pollID string) (*PollData, error) {
+    row := config.DB.QueryRow("SELECT id, title, description, expires_at, status FROM polls WHERE id = ?", pollID)
+    var p PollData
+    if err := row.Scan(&p.ID, &p.Title, &p.Description, &p.ExpiresAt, &p.Status); err != nil {
+        if err == sql.ErrNoRows {
+            return nil, fmt.Errorf("poll not found")
+        }
+        return nil, err
+    }
+
+    rows, err := config.DB.Query("SELECT id, option_text, order_index FROM poll_options WHERE poll_id = ?", pollID)
+    if err != nil {
+        return nil, err
+    }
+    defer rows.Close()
+
+    var options []Option
+    for rows.Next() {
+        var o Option
+        if err := rows.Scan(&o.ID, &o.Text, &o.Index); err != nil {
+            return nil, err
+        }
+        options = append(options, o)
+    }
+
+    p.Options = options
+    return &p, nil
+}

@@ -0,0 +1,57 @@
+package services
+
+import (
+    "database/sql"
+    "fmt"
+
+    "backand/config"
+    "backand/models"
+)
+
+func FetchPollData(pollID string) (*models.Poll, error) {
+    row := config.DB.QueryRow(`
+        SELECT id, title, description, expires_at, status, allow_realtime_results 
+        FROM polls WHERE id = ?`, pollID)
+
+    var p models.Poll
+    if err := row.Scan(&p.ID, &p.Title, &p.Description, &p.ExpiresAt, &p.Status, &p.AllowRealtimeResults); err != nil {
+        if err == sql.ErrNoRows {
+            return nil, fmt.Errorf("poll not found")
+        }
+        return nil, err
+    }
+
+    return &p, nil
+}
+
+func FetchPollOptions(pollID string) ([]models.PollOption, error) {
+    rows, err := config.DB.Query("SELECT id, option_text, order_index FROM poll_options WHERE poll_id = ?", pollID)
+    if err != nil {
+        return nil, err
+    }
+    defer rows.Close()
+
+    var options []models.PollOption
+    for rows.Next() {
+        var o models.PollOption
+        if err := rows.Scan(&o.ID, &o.Text, &o.Order); err != nil {
+            return nil, err
+        }
+        options = append(options, o)
+    }
+
+    return options, nil
+}
+
+func GetPollDetail(pollID string) (*models.Poll, error) {
+    row := config.DB.QueryRow(`
+        SELECT id, title, description, expires_at, status, allow_realtime_results 
+        FROM polls WHERE id = ?`, pollID)
+
+    var p models.Poll
+    if err := row.Scan(&p.ID, &p.Title, &p.Description, &p.ExpiresAt, &p.Status, &p.AllowRealtimeResults); err != nil {
+        return nil, err
+    }
+
+    return &p, nil
+}

+package services
+
+import (
+    "database/sql"
+    "fmt"
+
+    "backand/config"
+    "backand/models"
+)
+
+
+
+func FetchPollOptions(pollID string) ([]models.PollOption, error) {
+    rows, err := config.DB.Query("SELECT id, option_text, order_index FROM poll_options WHERE poll_id = ?", pollID)
+    if err != nil {
+        return nil, err
+    }
+    defer rows.Close()
+
+    var options []models.PollOption
+    for rows.Next() {
+        var o models.PollOption
+        if err := rows.Scan(&o.ID, &o.Text, &o.Order); err != nil {
+            return nil, err
+        }
+        options = append(options, o)
+    }
+
+    return options, nil
+}
+
+func GetPollDetail(pollID string) (*models.Poll, error) {
+    row := config.DB.QueryRow(`
+        SELECT id, title, description, expires_at, status, allow_realtime_results 
+        FROM polls WHERE id = ?`, pollID)
+
+    var p models.Poll
+    if err := row.Scan(&p.ID, &p.Title, &p.Description, &p.ExpiresAt, &p.Status, &p.AllowRealtimeResults); err != nil {
+        return nil, err
+    }
+
+    return &p, nil
+}
